content: I actually used a 20% off coupon on skincare products from my local pharmacy last week, and it was a great deal! I'm really happy I could save some money on the products I needed. Anyway, back to skincare discounts... I've been eyeing a particular brand that offers a buy one get one free deal on their facial moisturizers. Do you think it's a good idea to stock up on skincare products when they're on sale, or should I just buy what I need at the time?
